package.name: Net_Portscan
package.description: The Net_Portscan package allows one to perform basic portscanning functions with PHP. It supports checking an individual port or checking a whole range of ports on a machine.

release.notes: This version now closes socket connections immediately after having opened them, instead of waiting for PHP to do this at the end of the script execution. (#23161)
This is a maintenance release to reflect some updates to the directory structure.
This is the first stable release.
